results.description: Which Rangers player did you rate man of the match as the Ibrox club beat Hearts at Hampden to set up a Scottish League Cup final against Celtic?
results.shortTitle: Which Rangers player did you rate man of the match?
results.title: Rangers 3-0 Hearts: Which player did you rate man of the match?

results.description: Rangers will face holders Celtic in their first final since 2016 after dismantling managerless Hearts in the last four of the Scottish League Cup.
results.shortTitle: Rangers set up Old Firm League Cup final
results.title: Rangers 3-0 Hearts: Steven Gerrard's side set up final with Celtic

results.description: Test your knowledge of the previous Scottish League Cup meetings between Hearts and Rangers before they meet in this season's semi-final.
results.shortTitle: What do you recall of previous Rangers v Hearts League Cup ties?
results.title: Rangers v Hearts: What do you recall of previous League Cup meetings?

thumbnail.altText: Rangers and Hearts are set to face off for a chance to reach the final of the Scottish League Cup

results.description: Celtic win their 30th consecutive domestic cup tie, beating Hibernian in a frantic game at Hampden, to set up a Scottish League Cup final against Rangers or Hearts.
results.shortTitle: Celtic reach fourth League Cup final in row
results.title: Hibernian 2-5 Celtic: Neil Lennon's side ease into final

results.description: Which Celtic player did you vote man of the match in the Scottish League Cup semi-final between Hibernian and Celtic at Hampden?
results.shortTitle: Which Celtic player did you vote man of the match?
results.title: Hibernian 2-5 Celtic: Which Celtic player did you vote man of the match?

results.description: Craig Levein's "surprise" Hearts sacking will have no effect on Rangers' chances of reaching the League Cup final, says Ibrox boss Steven Gerrard.
results.title: Steven Gerrard says Rangers unaffected by Craig Levein's Hearts sacking

results.description: Hearts caretaker manager Austin MacPhee believes his squad are full of guilt after Craig Levein's departure but now need to show they can perform against Rangers.
results.shortTitle: 'We need to show we can match Rangers' - MacPhee
results.title: 'We need to show we're capable of matching Rangers' - Austin MacPhee

thumbnail.altText: 'We need to show we can match Rangers'

results.description: Celtic manager Neil Lennon says captain Scott Brown is "doubtful" for Saturday's Scottish League Cup semi-final against Hibernian - a day after Brown declared himself fit.
results.shortTitle: Brown doubt for Hibs semi-final - Lennon
results.title: Celtic: Scott Brown doubt for League Cup semi-final

results.description: Hibernian head coach Paul Heckingbottom hopes for a League Cup bounce against Celtic similar to the one he enjoyed with Barnsley.
results.shortTitle: Hibs boss looks for cup impetus
results.title: Hibs' Paul Heckinbottom looks for cup impetus from Celtic semi-final

results.description: Celtic captain Scott Brown declares himself fit for Saturday's League Cup semi-final after being taken off as a "precaution" in the 2-0 league win over St Mirren on Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Brown fit for League Cup semi-final
results.title: Scott Brown: Celtic captain declares himself fit for League Cup semi-final

results.description: Follow all the reaction as Rangers sweep aside managerless Hearts at Hampden to set up a Scottish League Cup final against Celtic.
results.title: 'Who knows how far we can go?' - Reaction as Rangers beat Hearts to reach League Cup final

results.description: Follow all the reaction as holders Celtic thrash Hibernian to reach their fourth consecutive Scottish League Cup final.
results.title: 'Some of the football was magnificent' - reaction as Celtic reach League Cup final

results.description: BBC Scotland looks at the reasons behind Hearts' and Hibernian's poor starts to the Scottish Premiership campaign.
results.shortTitle: What's happened to Hearts and Hibs?
results.title: Scottish Premiership: What's behind Hearts' and Hibs' poor start in the league?

results.description: Hibernian and Hearts react angrily after the SPFL reduced their ticket allocation for their respective League Cup semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Hearts and Hibs anger at ticket cut
results.title: Scottish League Cup: Hibs & Hearts angry at semi-final ticket reduction

results.description: Both League Cup semi-finals will return to being played at Hampden, with Hibs and Celtic having an evening kick-off.
results.shortTitle: Both League Cup semi-finals at Hampden
results.title: Scottish League Cup: Both semi-finals to be played Hampden

thumbnail.altText: Hearts v Celtic in the Scottish Cup final

results.description: Aberdeen score two penalties in normal time, but miss three in the shootout, as they are beaten by Hearts in a dramatic Scottish League Cup quarter-final at Tynecastle.
results.shortTitle: Hearts edge out Aberdeen on penalties
results.title: Hearts 2-2 Aberdeen (AET 3-0 on pens): Levein's side into League Cup semis

results.description: Rangers "found a different way to win", said Steven Gerrard, after his side beat Livingston to set up a Scottish League Cup semi-final with Hearts.
results.title: Steven Gerrard says Rangers found 'different way to win' at Livingston

results.description: A deflected goal from Glen Kamara proved enough to take Rangers through to the semi-finals of the Scottish League Cup.
results.title: Livingston 0-1 Rangers: Steven Gerrard's side through to semi-finals

results.description: Holders Celtic ease past Partick Thistle to win their 29th successive domestic cup tie and set up a Scottish League Cup semi-final with Hibernian.
results.shortTitle: Celtic ease into League Cup semi-finals
results.title: Celtic 5-0 Partick Thistle: Olivier Ntcham double helps Celtic into last four

thumbnail.altText: Jonny Hayes, Olivier Ntcham and Scott Brown celebrate a Celtic goal

results.description: Ten-man Hibernian edge out Kilmarnock on penalties to book a date with holders Celtic in the Scottish League Cup semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Hibs book semi-final date with Celtic
results.title: Kilmarnock 0-0 Hibs (AET 4-5 on pens): Heckingbottom's side into League Cup semis

thumbnail.altText: Paul Heckingbottom celebrates Hibernian's win over Kilmarnock
